text: The Mask Thai Literature () is the seventh season of The Mask Singer, a Thai singing competition program presented by Kan Kantathavorn. The program airs on Workpoint TV on Thursday at 20:05, starting from March 28, 2019 - August 8, 2019. The tournament format is similar to that of The Mask Line Thai. But the difference is this season was combined with Thai literature. == Panel of Judges == {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center;" |- ! No. ! Name !
